googleSheetEarlyVotingDataRow.vbmAbsenteeBallotRules:
* For the November 3, 2020 election, every registered voter will receive an **absentee ballot application** in the mail.
* Any registered Nebraska voter may request an absentee ballot and vote by mail.
googleSheetEarlyVotingDataRow.idRequirementsOvr: You can register to vote online if you have a Nebraska driver's license or state ID card.  If not, you can still register to vote by mail or in person.
googleSheetEarlyVotingDataRow.idRequirementsSdr: Bring your Nebraska driver's license or state ID card with you. If you don't have one, bring ONE photo ID that shows your name, and ONE document that shows your name and current address.  Acceptable documents include a utility bill, bank statement, paycheck, residential lease, or any government document that shows your name and address.
